caseTitle: The Collector of Sales Tax and Central Excise, Lahore v. M/s Qadbross Engneering (Pvt) Ltd., Lahore
tagline: Discussion on subsidiary company and holding company under the company law. (2) Payment of sales tax under the presumptive Tax Regime. (3) Fixed Amount of Sales Tax Rules, 1995 vis-à-vis the limitation for rebate, remission, refund, drawback or adjustment. (4) Powers of High Court under Section 47 of the Sales Act, 1990.
